name: Dongyuan Liu
bioHTML: Dongyuan Liu is a media artist who is interested in interactive art installations and audio-visual related works. His main focus is on topics related to the impacts generated by machines.

events.title: Artist Q&A - Thing Powers
events.desc: An opportunity to watch demonstrations of our artist's work alongside in-depth insight into their process. There is also the chance to connect with them through live Q&A and conversation surrounding the theme 'Thing Power'.
